title: Dead Sona Cosplay Art (Jhin)

replies.body: Woah, this is absolutely beautiful! Amazing work! ^-^
Do you know the artists name of the ORIGINAL Dead sona photo? Im dying to know )-:
I do not know, was wondering as well  :/

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BqJhWZrx,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-19T17:40:14.375+0000)
>
> [Bastien Lecouffe Deharme](http://deharme.deviantart.com/art/Sona-Teaser-League-of-Legends-580870087) :D

Thank you so much Katey!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BqJhWZrx,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-19T17:40:14.375+0000)
>
> [Bastien Lecouffe Deharme](http://deharme.deviantart.com/art/Sona-Teaser-League-of-Legends-580870087) :D
Another question, are many of the splash arts created by rioters? Or are many of them just handpicked users from Devian art?
looks really pretty; nice work! c: {{champion:37}}
